36/* Id */
37
38#ifndef KADM5_PWCHECK_H
39#define KADM5_PWCHECK_H 1
40
41
42#define KADM5_PASSWD_VERSION_V0 0
43#define KADM5_PASSWD_VERSION_V1 1
44
45typedef const char* (*kadm5_passwd_quality_check_func_v0)(krb5_context,
46 krb5_principal,
47 krb5_data*);
48
49/*
50 * The 4th argument, is a tuning parameter for the quality check
51 * function, the lib/caller will providing it for the password quality
52 * module.
53 */
54
55typedef int
56(*kadm5_passwd_quality_check_func)(krb5_context context,
57 krb5_principal principal,
58 krb5_data *password,
59 const char *tuning,
60 char *message,
61 size_t length);
62
63struct kadm5_pw_policy_check_func {
64 const char *name;
65 kadm5_passwd_quality_check_func func;
66};
67
68struct kadm5_pw_policy_verifier {
69 const char *name;
70 int version;
71 const char *vendor;
72 const struct kadm5_pw_policy_check_func *funcs;
73};
74
75#endif /* KADM5_PWCHECK_H */
76
